name: proxserve
description: Proxy Observe on objects and properties changes

scripts.build: npm run build-unminified; npm run build-minified
scripts.build-unminified: parcel build src/index.js --out-dir dist --out-file proxserve.js --global Proxserve --no-minify
scripts.build-minified: parcel build src/index.js --out-dir dist --out-file proxserve.min.js --global Proxserve

author: Noam Lin
